name: Diwan e Ghalib
tagline: Diwan e Ghalib (Android App based on A Desertful of Roses by Frances W. Pritchett)
body:
### Welcome to Diwan e Ghalib.
This is an Android app based on research and material by Frances W. Pritchett which she has provided on her website [A Desertful of Roses](http://www.columbia.edu/itc/mealac/pritchett/00ghalib/index.html).

Project Status: Alpha  
  
Contact:  
Salman Arshad  
salarshad @ outlook.com  
Phone: +92 343 5111 558
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
